package.name: ssci_x4_sensor_config_1
package.description: The ssci_x4_sensor_config_1 package is derived from OSRF's X4 vehicle model. This sensor configuration has a 3D lidar (copied from the X1 3D medium range lidar), and upward and downward point lidars based on the lidarlite.
package.author: Hector Escobar
